item.description:
Coolidge has scheduled Slumdog Millionaire for 7:30 pm in Theater 2. That is the upstairs theater and is much smaller than the main theater.

If you plan to come to the film, please purchase your ticket in advance at http://www.coolidge.o... Many members did not get into two previous showings and this showing may sell out well before Friday night.

I will be in Panera Bread by 6:45 to meetup with folks, especially members new to the group. Look for the guy holding a Meetup Sign that everyone is wondering about.

After the film, I'll hold up the Meetup Sign next to the exit. We'll make reservations at Pho Lemongrass only for those who indicate they plan to participate in the post-film discussion.

Please change your RSVP if you are unable to attend.
item.how_to_find_us: John will be holding a Meetup Sign after the film next to the Exit
item.name: Slumdog Millionaire Redux
